windows_savings: SAVE UP TO 40% ON ENERGY COSTS WITH NEW WINDOWS.
Aprovecha las ayudas de los fondos NextG: Take advantage of NexGeneration EU funding
Si cumples los requisitos, puedes alcanz: If eligible, you can receive up to €8,000 combining the grant and tax credit
You must be officially registered at this address.
Sustitución de componentes de la envolve: Replacement of thermal envelope components with those meeting CTE standards.
Reducción del 7% de la demanda energétic: Achieve at least a 7% reduction in energy demand for heating and cooling.
Aislamiento térmico, acústico, protecció: Thermal and acoustic insulation, solar protection, and airtightness.
Su baja transmitancia térmica la convier: Its low thermal transmittance makes it one of the most energy-efficient windows available.
Las triple junta y el herraje perimetral: The triple gasket and perimeter hardware provide exceptional airtightness, exceeding the mandatory BlowerDoor test required for Passivhaus certification.
El vidrio con control solar filtra el 50: Solar control glass filters out 50% of the solar radiation responsible for indoor overheating.
Nuestro PVC está formulado especialmente: Our PVC is specially formulated for hot, sunny climates, unlike profiles from cooler countries that lack integrated solar protection.
Utilizamos espuma de alta densidad certi: We use certified high-density foam and premium silicone to ensure a highly airtight seal.
Nuestro compromiso contigo incluye un se: We are committed to providing you with fast and effective after-sales support.
Recibirás una oferta con las tres opcion: You'll receive a quote with the following three options
Perfil más aislante de 76 mm con triple: More insulating 76 mm profile with triple gasket
Perfil de 82 mm con triple vidrio de 50: 82 mm profile with 50 mm triple-pane glass
tratamiento térmico, solar y gas Argón: thermal, solar treatment, and Argon gas filling

Soy Quim Rodríguez.<br/>Te acompañaré en:
I'm Quim Rodríguez.
I will guide you through every step of your renovation journey. My goal is to address all your questions and offer the best solutions for your needs.
Te ofrezco un servicio personalizado don:
I provide a personalized service, handling every aspect of your purchase myself. I will manage the offer, terms, timelines, installation, finishes, and warranties.
You can rely on me to resolve any issues from start to finish.
Principalmente me he formado trabajando:
I’ve primarily developed my expertise by working on high-energy efficiency projects, including bioclimatic homes and Passivhaus-certified buildings.
Specializing in PVC profiles, I've collaborated with leading manufacturers and tested their most efficient products.
I've also been involved in high-efficiency projects alongside some of the most innovative architects in the industry.
In addition, I have specialized in the renovation of traditional country houses, rustic stone homes, and custom windows such as curved, arched, or round designs.
Aprovecha toda mi experiencia para conse: Leverage my expertise to achieve the best results for your project.
Las siguientes preguntas son las dudas q: Here are the most frequently asked questions from our clients.
¿Necesito estar empadronado en la vivien: Do I need to be registered at the property to qualify for the subsidy?
Sí, es requisito indispensable estar emp: Yes, being registered at the property is essential to qualify for the subsidy.
Sí, para poder acceder a las ayudas, los: Yes, tenants can access the subsidies, but they must present a registration certificate and prove an agreement with the property owner that the tenant will cover the renovation costs.
¿El IVA se puede computar como gasto sub: Can VAT be included as a subsidizable expense?
Sí, por norma general y para particulare: Yes, generally speaking, VAT is considered a subsidizable expense for individuals. The subsidy calculation is based on the total invoice amount, including VAT. However, for companies or individuals who can recover or partially offset VAT, the subsidizable amount would be the net amount before VAT.
¿Qué plazo tengo para realizar las obras: What is the deadline for completing the renovations?
El plazo para la ejecución de las obras: You have 12 months from the date the subsidy is granted to complete the renovation work. The deadline for applying for subsidies is December 31, 2024. This means you must apply by the end of 2024, but you will have 12 months after the subsidy is awarded to carry out the work.
¿Qué es exactamente la deducción fiscal: What exactly is the NextGen tax deduction?
La deducción fiscal NextGen es una reduc: The NexGen tax deduction allows you to reduce the amount of taxes you owe on your income tax return by carrying out window renovation work with our company. Here's how it works and how you can benefit from it.
¿Cómo se aplica la deducción fiscal Next: How does the NexGen tax deduction apply?
En tu declaración de la renta, después d: On your income tax return, after calculating your tax liability, you can apply certain deductions permitted by law to reduce the amount owed. The NexGen tax deduction is one of these deductions.
Sin deducción: Supongamos que después de: Without deduction: Let's say after all calculations, your tax return indicates you owe €1,000 in taxes.
Con deducción NextGen: Si tienes derecho: With NextGen deduction: If you qualify for a €300 tax deduction for window renovation work done by our company, you would subtract that €300 from the €1,000 you owe. As a result, you would only have to pay €700.
Diferencias entre deducción fiscal NextG: Differences between NexGen tax deduction and NexGen subsidy:
Reduces la cantidad de impuestos que deb: Reduces the amount of taxes you owe.
No recibes dinero directamente; simpleme: You don’t receive money directly; you simply pay less in taxes.
Si tu declaración de la renta no tiene s: If your tax return shows no balance due, you will not receive the deduction as cash.
Recibes una cantidad de dinero que se de: You receive a sum of money deposited directly into your bank account.
Es una ayuda económica que puedes utiliz: It’s a financial aid you can use to cover the costs of window renovation work.
No depende de tu declaración de la renta: It does not depend on your tax return.
Importancia de la deducción fiscal NextG: Importance of the NexGen tax deduction:
Ahorro en impuestos: La deducción fiscal: Tax savings: The NexGen tax deduction is beneficial as it allows you to reduce your tax burden, which can be significant depending on the deduction amount.
Incentivo: Es un incentivo adicional par: Incentive: It’s an additional incentive to carry out window renovation work with our company, as you can benefit not only from direct subsidies but also from a tax reduction.
Documentación: Es importante conservar t: Documentation: It is crucial to keep all documentation and receipts for expenses incurred tocorrectly apply the NexGen tax deduction.
Normativas: Las normativas sobre deducci: Regulations: Tax deduction regulations may vary, so it is advisable to consult a tax advisor or review current tax laws to ensure you meet all the requirements.
¿Se pueden deducir los gastos de tramita: Are processing and management costs deductible?
Sí, son subvencionables los costos de ge: Yes, management costs related to the execution of the works and associated expenses, such as professional fees, project drafting costs, necessary technical reports and certificates, and administrative processing fees, are subsidizable as long as they are duly justified and within the aid limits. Costs related to building permits, fees, taxes, or levies are not considered subsidizable.

Introduce tus palabras clave y presiona: Enter your keywords and press Enter.
Hemos negociado con nuestros proveedores: We have negotiated with our suppliers to offer you special prices during Black Friday week. This is a unique opportunity to change your windows and improve the energy efficiency of your home.
Recuerda, esta oferta es limitada y no p: Remember, this offer is limited, and we cannot guarantee the same prices after this week as they depend on our suppliers. Take advantage now!
Además, hemos llegado a un acuerdo con n: Additionally, we have reached an agreement with our financial institution to offer special financing this week. You can finance your purchase for up to 12 months with no interest.
¡No dejes pasar esta oportunidad de mejo: Don't miss this opportunity to improve your home without financial worries!
Además, puedes combinar nuestra oferta c: Moreover, you can combine our offer with the Next Generation grant, which allows you to save up to 40% on the price of the windows, with a maximum of 3,000 euros. This allows you to achieve a total savings of up to 50%.
No pierdas la oportunidad de modernizar: Don't miss the chance to modernize your home. Request your quote today!
conditionsText: *You must meet the conditions of the grant and financing must be approved by the financial institution
faq_black_friday_title: Black Friday Offer Frequently Asked Questions
faq_black_friday_intro: The following questions are the most frequently asked doubts by our customers.
faq_black_friday_offer_details: The Black Friday offer includes a 10% discount, in addition to the option to finance your purchase at 0% interest over 12 months if the financial institution approves your transaction. Also, if you meet the required conditions, you can apply for the NextGen grant, which can be up to 3,000 €.
faq_black_friday_deadline_details: The deadline ends on November 29, but we need several days to prepare the quote and request financing, as we need to have all the documentation processed by November 29. If you are interested in the offer, don't delay in requesting it, as if you miss the deadline, we will not be able to maintain the promotion.
faq_black_friday_offer_dates: Why is the offer only available on these dates?
faq_black_friday_offer_dates_details: These discounts, except for the NextGen grant, depend on our window suppliers and the financial institution. Therefore, after this date, it is not within our power to maintain the offer. If you are interested, take advantage! This is the best offer we have had in a long time.
faq_black_friday_financing_details_1: Financing depends on the approval of the financial institution, which will assess the risk of each application and may approve or deny it depending on the case. You can set up payments to be deducted from your current bank, so you don't need to switch institutions.
faq_black_friday_financing_details_2: Generally, the required documentation to apply for financing includes:
faq_black_friday_financing_bank_receipt: Bank Receipt: Justifying ownership of the account.
faq_black_friday_financing_account_numbe: Account Number: Where payments will be deducted.
faq_black_friday_financing_salary: Pay Slip: In some cases, it may be necessary to present a pay slip.
faq_black_friday_financing_unique_case: Remember that each case is unique, and the financial institution will evaluate the documentation presented to make a decision.
faq_black_friday_nextgen_details_1: The Next Gen grant is an aid from the European government aimed at improving the energy efficiency of homes. It allows for support of up to 40% of the price of the windows, with a maximum amount of 3,000 euros.
faq_black_friday_nextgen_requirements_in: If you meet all the requirements, you can take advantage of this grant. The main conditions are:
faq_black_friday_nextgen_requirements_wi: That the windows meet the required minimum insulation standards.
faq_black_friday_nextgen_contact: For more information on the requirements and how to access the grant, feel free to contact us.
faq_black_friday_contact: If you have any further questions,
ALTA EFICIENCIA ENERGETICA A PRECIOS ULT: HIGH ENERGY EFFICIENCY AT ULTRA-COMPETITIVE PRICES
